lyrics:
11 contributorsoffend in every way lyricsverse 1
im patient of this plan
as humble as i can
ill wait another day
before i turn away
but know this much is true
no matter what i do
offend in every way
i dont know what to say

break

verse 2
im coming through the door
but theyre expecting more
of an interesting man
sometimes i think i can
but how much can i fake
ill speak until i break
with every word i say
offend in every way

break

verse 3
you tell me to relax
and listen to these facts
that everyones my friend
and will be till the end
but know this much is true
no matter what i do
no matter what i say
offend in every wayyou might also like3embed
